example.title: Code listing: The comments table
example.programlisting: CREATE TABLE comments ( id int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, item_id int(11) NOT NULL default '1', username varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', useremail varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', userwebsite varchar(255) default NULL, userip varchar(20) default NULL, comment longtext NOT NULL, created int(11) default NULL, modified int(11) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY item_id (item_id) ) TYPE=MyISAM;
